title: Deadbuild v1.1.2
description:
You need Microsoft Framework 4.0 and Xna Redistributable 4.0, and also an unpacking tool such as 7zip or WinRAR.

Your objective is to defend your village against waves of zombies.
They spawn at night so you have time to gather resources and build defenses at day.
And when the night comes you can micro your hero and try to keep your village protected from enemies.

The idea of the game is to mix together the best sides of Tower Defense and RTS.
Some of the zombies walk on road, while others take the shortest path to your headquarters.
Some of the undead even fly, attacking anything that moves!

Only towers and your hero can attack enemies.
Towers are upgraded by training mages and warriors and putting them to towers.
You can also research different technologies from buildings to help you defend against horde of zombies.
